籤詩版本二:
Ndakashinga mhepo nemvura kuti ndidzokere kumba, asi muviri wangu wakaita senyenganyenga
Ini ndinobata nio mumuromo mangu uye ndinoda kuita chigadziko, asi kuguma kwechigadziko kwakaputsika uye ndebvu dzakafukidzwa nematope.
詩意:
Hexagram iyi inomiririra mufananidzo wenyenganyenga yakabata Ni mumuromo mayo.
Zvinhu zvose zvakaoma uye zvakaoma.
解曰: Mhando dzose dzemanomano. Mangwanani nemasikati hazvina kumira. Ndiani anoziva izvi. Mushure mezvose, ibasa rakaoma.
籤詩故事一:
◇Dong Yong akaviga baba vake
Dong Yong weHan Dynasty aive murume weQiancheng. Mhuri yake yaiva yevarombo uye akafirwa naamai vake achiri mudiki, saka aitofanira kuchengeta baba vake ari ega.
Baba vake pavakafa, Dong Yong akanga asina mari yekumuviga, saka akakwereta yuan 10 000 kune vamwe kuti avige baba vake. Mune ramangwana, kana ndisina mari yekudzorera, ndichava muranda. Zuva riri rose vanofanira kunotora mutoro mumwe wehuni, mitoro mina yemvura, uye badza maeka matanhatu kana kuti manomwe eminda, riri basa rakaoma zvikuru.
(Nyaya iyi idimikira rekushanda nesimba, asi hapana chasara.)
聖意: Imba ichatanga yapinda munjodzi kozouya yakanaka.Chenjerai kutsvaga pfuma,kuita dhiri,kuroora,kuroora,wanano yakaipa.Rokko varume vanofamba netsoka,Yoshida Canli,mhuka nhanhatu,wana munhu,ona dare redzimhosva, ruramiswa, tama, tsvaga pfuma yakarasika, ona hurwere, shuvira rombo rakanaka mugomo nemuguva.
